attributes.action: better regulations on private holiday homes in residential areas
attributes.additional_details: our neighbours turned there 3bed house into a holiday let & there have been raves & party's & nothing can be done by law! this needs to be regulated better to stop quiet streets turning into holiday resorts and party homes!
attributes.background: more houses in residential streets are being turned into holiday let's and air b&b's. They are only allowed to rent the property out for 90days a year however there is no law to regulate it.

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like regulations on private holiday homes changes but we aren't sure what change you would like to see.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like to see taken.
